content: Hollow Knight: Silksong is revealed
The steam store page is live
Nintendo claims the game will release within the fiscal year
Nintendo announces there will be a playable demo at the Nintendo E3 event
Nintendo uploads a playthrough of the Demo to YouTube
Team Cherry announces there will be a playable demo at the PAX Aus event
Nintendo makes another claim that the game will release within the fiscal year
Leth posts a riddle with info about 'Huntress'
Leth posts a riddle with info about 'Grindle'
Leth posts a riddle with info about 'Caravan'
Leth posts a riddle with info about 'Seth'
Silksong's logo is part of the Nintendo Indie world's infographic
Edge Magazine interview with Team Cherry published
Nvidia DB leak shows a release date of February 15, 2022
New trailer at the Xbox Games Showcase
Xbox claims the game will release within the fiscal year
Leth announces that game will not release in 2023
Leth confirms that Silksong will release before 'Crowsworn
Silksong gets an ESRB rating
William Pellen tweets a cryptic message that led people to believe news was coming on April 2
Leth announces the connection between William's tweet and April 2 were purely coincidental
Silksong appears at a Nintendo Direct with a 2025 release window
